proposal: Understanding the importance of empowering women in Web3, $WOMEN is making strides towards addressing gender inequality. With only 13% female founders and 27% female employees in the space, your project is crucial. Congrats on reaching 324 holders on the ETH network! Our tools, like DEX and Lottery, align with your vision by offering revenue-sharing opportunities to your community, not just the team. Let's collaborate to further empower your community.
